text: - Not sure what’s happening in Los Angeles . There is no joy for the Valiant at all, and although the Gladiators are mostly competitive, they can’t close games out. I’m sure things will get better but to be this far behind the 8-ball is shocking.

The Hangzhou Spark defeat the Los Angeles Gladiators 3-1. The Spark have snapped their losing streak and look continue to climb up the standings with the win today. The Gladiators will look to regroup & finish Stage 1 strong. #OWL2019 #OverwatchLeague #Bang #ShieldsUP pic.twitter.com/UtRxGsFMQ4

It’s very weird to see two elite teams from last year in the Gladiators and the Valiant combine for only a single win so far for Los Angeles . No clue what the issues are since both teams had strong teamwork and infrastructure that should have translated well to the goats meta.
